name: A Woman's Bag - Lost & Found Edition
name_original: A Woman's Bag - Lost & Found Edition
description:
Everyone know that..  bag of woman contains everythings...what do you want and beyond inside this magical object!

One Bag, one hand and some fast objects to catch!

With a little of italian style and some fast actions you can play this silly and ironic game!

Your progress are save in a online global leaderboard, play with your friends and become the leader!

How to Play!

Controls :

Look this square, the key is the square!

Catch indicator

Get  many points as possible and rise in position on the ONLINE
